welcome.description: Explore the mythical Acheron River with our unique horse riding and rafting tours. An unforgettable adventure awaits in the heart of Greece.
welcome.title: Welcome to Pony Club
welcome.intro: Welcome to Pony Club at the Acheron River, where adventure meets nature.
welcome.history: Since 1998, we've offered unforgettable horse riding and rafting experiences for families and adventurers. Explore our farm with 8 horses and our rafting base, guided by experts who prioritize safety and respect for the environment.
welcome.callToAction: Join us for rafting, riding, kayaking, and trekking at Acheron River in Glyki, Greece.
